alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Montgomery; Telfair; Wheeler; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 5:01AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Heavy rain and strong winds will impact portions of southern Laurens, Dodge, Telfair, southwestern Treutlen, eastern Wilcox, Wheeler and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 545 AM EST... At 500 AM EST, a line of heavy showers and embedded thunderstorms extended from Rebie to near Eastman to near Rebecca, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Eastman, Soperton, Abbeville, Alamo, Helena, Chester, Rochelle, Glenwood, Milan, Dexter, Cadwell, Rhine, Scotland, Chauncey, Rentz, Jacksonville, Union, Lothair and Plainfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM EST for central Georgia.
